comments:
The custom log I added to redirect logs to different streams is causing problems with Eclipse help startup due to class loader problems. The WebClientLog is not visible to the equinox jetty server resulting in failure to launch.  Will look at enabling without use of system properties.

Fixed.  .options file added. Enable tracing of httpclient via org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui/debug/httpclient in Tracing config.
*** Bug 207275 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
